mapper.sql: id, course_code, start_class_code, start_class_name, start_class_time, hours, people_number, price, room, location, longitude, latitude, status, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into wx_course_start_class_record (id, course_code, start_class_code, start_class_name, start_class_time, hours, people_number, price, room, location, longitude, latitude, status, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startClassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hours,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{peopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update wx_course_start_class_record
course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_class_code = #{startClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_class_name = #{startClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_class_time = #{startClassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hours = #{hours,jdbcType=INTEGER},
people_number = #{peopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wx_course_start_class_record set course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_class_code = #{startClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_class_name = #{startClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_class_time = #{startClassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, hours = #{hours,jdbcType=INTEGER}, people_number = #{peopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM wx_course_start_class_record wcscr WHERE wcscr.`status` != 0 AND wcscr.course_code = #{courseCode}

SELECT wcscr.start_class_code AS startClassCode, wcscr.start_class_time AS startClassTime, wcscr.hours AS hours, wcscr.people_number AS peopleNumber, wcscr.price AS price, wcscr.location AS location, wcscr.status AS status FROM wx_course_start_class_record wcscr
wcscr.status = #{status}
AND ( wcscr.start_class_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') OR wcscr.location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') )
ORDER BY wcscr.create_time DESC
